body.bibl: Johnson, Maxwell E. “The Origins of the Anaphoral Use of the Sanctus and Epiclesis Revisited: The Contribution of Gabriele Winkler and Its Implications.” In Crossroad of Cultures: Studies in Liturgy and Patristics in Honor of Gabriele Winkler, edited by Hans-Jürgen Feulner, Elena Velkovska, and Robert F. Taft, 405–42. Orientalia Christiana Analecta 260. Roma: Pontificio Istituto Orientale, 2000.
